data.name: CoinsPaid
data.description: What is CoinsPaid? CoinsPaid is a leading financial ecosystem with more than 700 merchants. The company processed €1.25 billion worth of crypto in 2020 and €1.8 billion in 2021 so far. The CoinsPaid ecosystem includes financial crypto products like a payment gateway that processes 5% of all on-chain BTC transactions with more than 700,000 BTC transactions in a month, enterprise and personal wallets with a built-in crypto exchange, an OTC desk, and a SaaS crypto gateway. Soon a CPD token, a range of DeFi tools, and marketing services will be added. CoinsPaid IDO The IDO’s goal is to connect real business with decentralized financial solutions. As the next step in realizing the company’s mission: to bring the joy and simplicity of cryptocurrency payments to the world. In Q3 CoinsPaid plans on releasing a CPD token that will be available through Initial Dex Offering that has already been launched. What’s a CPD token? CoinsPaid Token (CPD) is the utility token of the CoinsPaid ecosystem. The CPD token will link on-chain and off-chain products, ensuring a smooth transfer of value across the ecosystem. The token holders will receive up to 50% off service fees, staking rewards, and more only by using the CPD token. Right after the start token will have various use cases: 30% discount for CPD staking fees and an additional 20% discount for paying fees in CPD tokens 50% lower fees for deposits in CPD 10% discount for B2B customers for token promotion Cross-chain swaps Additional discounts on future service from our platform CPD will be integrated into each service and product of the CoinsPaid ecosystem as a payment, rewarding, or discount means. Future plans and products Until the end of the year, CoinsPaid will develop additional functionality and add more use cases to the CPD token, including staking, loyalty rewards for affiliates, and bridge protocol for swaps and asset control via multiple chains. In Q3 and Q4 of 2021, CoinsPaid plans on widely expanding the functionality of the existing wallet by adding subscription billing, an affiliate system, and a white-label personal wallet. The most important innovation to the wallet will be bank card support. It will allow CoinsPaid to make their wallet Enterprise and connect it to the ecosystems and products that work with fiat. In addition to the enterprise crypto wallet, there is another key product that’s being developed by CoinsPaid — Crypto Payment Gateway. In Q3 and Q4 of 2021, it will receive additional plugins for eCommerce, widgets for PoS, and add off-chain transactions with 0 mining fees for users of the personal wallet. To guide users through new services and DeFi solutions, CoinsPaid Academy will be launched. It aims to drive crypto adoption in the masses and educate users about disrupting services driven by DeFi. Also, merchants will be offered full-cycle marketing to flawlessly integrate crypto services and boost revenue. In addition, CoinsPaid will release its own DeFi dashboard in Q1 2022. The dashboard will integrate popular decentralized solutions and tools.

stages.comments:
How to participate in the public sale?
The primary right of redemption of CPD belongs to the holders of Plasma tokens who hold at least 20,000 xPPAY. This stage will last the first 15 minutes of the IDO period. Then the rest of the token pool will be divided among the other eligible IDO participants who passed the KYC procedure and got into the whitelist, the allocation into which is not guaranteed to anyone. Please be aware that the IDO is conducted on a first come - first serve basis. 

How to get xPPAY?
To get xPPAY you need to stake your PPAY. Get at least 20,000 xPPAY to participate in our IDO. Please visit the corresponding page of the staking platform to calculate the rates: https://apy.plasma.finance/market/0x054D64b73d3D8A21Af3D764eFd76bCaA774f3Bb2/trade#/swap
